page.title: 16LOCAL PEOPLE
page.content:
{ MR O'BRIEN},RECTOR OF CLYDEBANK HIGH SCHOOL ,previously the Rector of Tiree School. Before becoming a Rector he taught Modern Studies. He lives in Stirlingshire with his family. He feels sad about the amount of vandalism and unemployment in the town He thinks that in the future Clydebank will get back on its feet as an industrial town and that new developments such as the Business Park and Radio Clyde will do a lot to improve the town's image. He hopes to make changes in the future. He also encourages subjects other than those that are purely academic.
{TRACY ROBINSON,}is in 5th year at C.H.S. She was born and brought up in Clydebank. At school studies English, Maths,Physics and Geography for her Higher and Chemistry for her O' grade.
